translation.site-title: TJ YANG: Architect of Narrative Worlds

terra.name: TERRA
terra.title: Travel Round Hanger
terra.subtitle: The Spirit of Original Intentions
terra.description: Representing the courage to begin, inspired by familial support and the will to follow one's dreams. The collapsible hangers symbolize the start of a journey, like a 'rolling stone gathers no moss'.

cybennah.name: CYBENNAH
cybennah.title: PAW Running Shoes
cybennah.subtitle: The Spirit of Athletic Pursuit
cybennah.description: Earned through failure and mentorship. The realization that true victory is internal growth, not just speed. It grants the user the 'explosive power of a cheetah's claws'.

aquatica.name: AQUATICA
aquatica.title: MANTA Underwater Scooter
aquatica.subtitle: The Spirit of Exploration
aquatica.description: The embodiment of courage and curiosity in the face of the unknown. It allows one to navigate dangerous and beautiful new worlds, embodying the desire to explore uncharted realms.

eclipsia.name: ECLIPSIA
eclipsia.title: Eclipse Clock
eclipsia.subtitle: The Spirit of Eternal Love
eclipsia.description: A deep, empathetic dive into the universal emotions of love and separation, understanding that separation reveals love's true value. It is a vessel for lovers' emotions and memories.

ekeres.name: EKERES
ekeres.title: GATHER Chair
ekeres.subtitle: The Spirit of Cooperation
ekeres.description: The realization that the greatest strength comes from unity. It transforms a diverse group into a harmonious whole. Its ability to be disassembled and reassembled is a metaphor for collective strength.
